51.  
Valuation of total assets
 (1) The value of the objects included in total assets shall be determined, in the case of an object extant at the time of termination of the proprietary relationship, on the basis of the value of the object at the time of termination of the proprietary relationship and, upon determining the sum to be added to the value of total assets due to decrease of assets on the basis of subsection 2 of § 48, on the basis of the value of the assets at the time of the decrease.
 (2) Subsection 1 of this section also applies to valuation of obligations.
